text: Correct me if I'm wrong In the next two years so I I read that as 2027, we'll see agents start to pass your your modern touring test i Yeah, that the modern Turing test was something I proposed and it was basically making a pretty simple prediction It's pretty clear we would go from recognition which was the first part of the wave to generation uh which is clearly we're now in the middle of or maybe ending that chapter to then having perfect generation at every time step which in sequence is going to produce assisting agentive actions and actions would obviously look like an intelligent knowledge worker or a project manager a strategist or a startup founder or whatever it is And so then how would we measure that performance rather than measuring it with academic and theoretical benchmarks One would clearly want to measure it through capabilities What can the thing do in the in the economy in the workplace And how do we measure the economy We measure it by dollars and cents And so could you know what would be the first model to make a million dollars i given as I recall $100,000 in starting capital That's right Which model could turn it into a million dollars six return on investment by an agent
